name: SportsBallGame
description:
Game made for the 2016 Global Game Jam. As the spectators of an exciting Sportsballgame match, you must catch tasty hot dogs as the vendor throws them. Hold the key corresponding to the audience section to get 'em!

When prompted, DO THE WAVE by hitting all the keys in each row from left to right.

When you do well, your team does well! Help them get more points than the other team.
